Defining URL:https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/ValueSet/UKCore-EthnicCategory-1-0-0
Version:1.0.0
Name:UKCoreEthnicCategory
Definition:

A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a person's ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

Publisher:NHS Digital
Copyright:

Copyright Â© 2019 NHS Digital

Source Resource:XML / JSON

FHIR Profile(s) referencing this ValueSet:

  • UK Core Ethnic Category Extension

UK Core Ethnic Category

A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a person's ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

Copyright Statement: Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-EthnicCategory-1-0-0

This value set contains 68 concepts
